heading: HB03091
0: AN ACT BANNING IMPOSITION OF EXPIRY DATES ON GIFT CHECKS BY COMMERCIAL ESTABLISHMENTS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
mother-bill statusstatus: Republic Act RA10962 enacted on 2017-12-19 Substituted by HB06016
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03091
FULL TITLE : AN ACT BANNING IMPOSITION OF EXPIRY DATES ON GIFT CHECKS BY COMMERCIAL ESTABLISHMENTS AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASTELO, WINSTON "WINNIE"
DATE FILED : 2016-08-17
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Referred to Stakeholders on 2016-09-19
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-05-23
          -The Committee approved the proposed Gift Check Act as amended, with all the Members present as co-authors thereof.
          -Deliberation on House Bill No. 3091 and House Bill No. 5157
      3. Committee Report filed on 2017-07-20
          -Committee Report No. 325, House Bill No. 6016 in substitution of House Bill Nos. 3091 and 5157.
      4. Deliberated by the Conference Committee on 2017-10-10
          -Bicameral Conference Committee Meeting on the disagreeing provisions of House Bill No. 6016 and Senate Bill No.1466.
MOTHER BILL: HB06016
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRADE AND INDUSTRY ON 2016-08-24
